main event: Observers reported seeing a blue-white light traveling at a high speed leaving a blue-white trail, initially thought to be a meteor.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 3 to 10 seconds., One observer heard a hissing sound associated with the object., A small-like mass was reportedly detached from the main object during the sighting., The Quadrantid meteor shower coincided with the sighting date., The object was observed moving without any air or engine noise.
